com.airg.android.device

Class Connectivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.airg.android.device.Connectivity

  • public class Connectivity
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides common network connectivity tasks. You can use this class either as an instance, or just the provided static methods. Static methods are recommended for single or infrequent queries. For multiple or frequent querying of the network state, an instance is recommended.

        Parameters:

      • online

        public static boolean online(android.content.Context context)
        Queries whether the device is currently online
        Parameters:
        context - active context
        Returns:
        true if the current active network is connected and false if no active network or the active network is not connected
